content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: snow
inventory=[{"type": "warped_sign", "quantity": 10, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 56, "index": 25}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft snow, I need to craft snow_block first, which requires 4 snowballs in a square in the crafting grid. The snowballs are in slot 35, and I will move one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1
